intro: Ixora longipedicellata, commonly known as the long pedicel ixora, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its clusters of bright orange or red flowers, which bloom throughout the year in some regions. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a smooth texture. Ixora longipedicellata is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its vibrant floral display and adaptability to various soil types.
